law.catch_line: Subject to the approval of the Governor, the Secretary at any time may decrease the pay rate for any...

text.section:
Subject to the approval of the Governor, the Secretary at any time may decrease the pay rate for any class included in:
the Standard Pay Plan; or
except for a position for which pay is set by a unit with independent pay-setting authority, the Executive Pay Plan.
A decrease of a pay rate under this section applies to all employees in the affected class.
